Text saved: A stereotype is a simple idea about a group of people. This idea is often not true.

It is good to know about different things. People may think in different ways. People may act in different ways. This can help us. We can stop problems. We can stop not understanding each other. But we must remember this: stereotypes are bad. They are bad for making good business connections.

Many things change how we act and think. Our country's way of life changes us. The area we come from changes us. The people we spend time with change us. Our age changes us. If we are a man or a woman changes us. Our company's way of working changes us. What happens to us in life changes us.

So, we should remember possible different things. But we must not use them. We must not think all people from a country are the same.
Feedback received: Grade 1/10 - FAIL
